diggingin.description:
Defying Demands for Exit or Reduction of Activities (237 Companies) (Grade: F)
Companies that are just continuing business-as-usual in Russia...

records.name: Agricultural Bank of China
records.action: Russian companies open accounts with the bank; decline to comment

records.name: ANT Group
records.action: joint venture with the Russian Sovereign Wealth Fund

records.name: Anta Sports
records.action: still operating and providing online sales to Russia

records.name: Antal
records.action: still operating and actively hiring in Russia

records.name: AnyDesk Software
records.action: still providing services to Russia; not disclosed publicly

records.name: Ariston Group
records.action: still operating and actively hiring in Russia

records.name: Asics
records.action: still operating in Russia; not disclosed publicly

records.name: Babolat
records.action: still operating and selling to Russia

records.name: Bharat Petroleum (BPCL)

records.action: still operating in Russia & online sales running

records.action: business as usual; plans new brands in Russia

records.name: Eutelsat

records.name: Faurecia
records.action: still operating and advertising in Russia

records.name: FAW Group

records.name: Fondital
records.action: still operating and investing in Russia

records.name: Fujifilm
records.action: still operating and advertising in Russia

records.name: Geoplin

records.name: Hoffmann Group

records.name: Indian Oil Corporation

records.name: Industrial Bank (China)

records.name: International Baccalaureate Organization
records.action: still offers professional development services to Russian teachers

records.name: JD.com

records.name: Jean Cacharel
records.action: still selling and advertising in Russia

records.name: Kemin
records.action: still operating in Russia; declined to commend

records.name: KION Group
records.action: still operating in Russia; not disclosed publicly

records.name: Koch Industries

records.name: Koton
records.action: still advertising  and selling to Russia

records.name: Lemken
records.action: still operating and advertising in Russia

records.name: Liebherr

records.name: Makita
records.action: still working with dealers in Russia

records.name: Match Group
records.action: continue to operate in Russia including Tinder

records.name: Mitsui
records.action: continuing operations within sanctions compliance & shares in Sakhalin-2 project

records.name: New Yorker Marketing & Media GmbH

records.name: PowerChina

records.name: Projahn
records.action: still operating in Russia through a subsidiary

records.name: Tupperware

records.action: still advertising and selling to Russia

buyingtime.description:
Holding Off New Investments/Development (160 Companies) (Grade: D)
Companies postponing future planned investment/development/marketing while continuing substantive business...

records.name: Aalberts
records.action: continue operations on an unspecified "lower" level & postpone investments

records.name: Abbvie
records.action: suspend aesthetics operations, pause new clinical trials

records.name: Accumalux
records.action: still operating plant in Togliatti, Russia

records.name: Aegon
records.action: ending new investments where has control over fund

records.name: Air Liquide
records.action: Some clients no longer supplied, others scaled down; all Russian investments on hold

records.name: Airbus
records.action: suspend supply of parts and deliveries/servicing, t but continue substantial titanium purchases from Russia

records.name: Alcon
records.action: suspend new investments and new clinical trial enrollment in Russia

records.name: AmerisourceBergen
records.action: cease new business initiatives but continue existing clinical trials, and distributing health products

records.name: Andbank
records.action: investigate if Russian customers are subject to European sanctions

records.name: Andritz
records.action: suspend unspecified new business in Russia for time being

records.name: Archer Daniels Midland (ADM)
records.action: unspecified scaling down of non-essential operations

records.name: Arconic
records.action: pause new contracts but continue existing

records.name: Aurubis AG
records.action: monitor situation and review structures of Russian business partners

records.name: Bang & Bonsomer
records.action: suspend new investments but still operating in Russia

records.name: Barilla
records.action: all new investments and advertising activities on hold; limit Russia production to pasta and bread

records.name: BlaBlaCar
records.action: Stopped new investment but stays in Russia

records.name: Boiron
records.action: suspend new investments & stop clinical trials

records.name: Bolt
records.action: remove all Russia-manufactured and Russian-branded goods

records.name: Bristol-Myers Squibb
records.action: pause new trials & stop enrollment of new participants; still actively hiring in Russia

records.name: Calfrac Well Services
records.action: suspension of new investments in Russia

records.name: Campari
records.action: continue sales in Russia but suspend new investments

records.name: CAPRI Holdings (Versace, Michael Kors, Jimmy Cho)
records.action: online orders unavailable but still advertising; no information about on-site sales

records.name: Cargill
records.action: unspecified scaling down of non-essential operations

records.name: Citadele Banka
records.action: still allows transactions to Russia but introduced more thorough checks

records.name: Colgate-Palmolive
records.action: continue essential health and hygiene products

records.name: Crèdit Andorrà
records.action: investigate if Russian customers are subject to European sanctions

records.name: Danone
records.action: suspend all investment projects but continue dairy products; suspend imports of Evian and Alpro products

records.name: Deceuninck
records.action: stop investments & cut links with other establishments

records.name: DMK Group
records.action: suspend new investments/advertising but continue sales and plant operations in Russia

records.name: Domino's Pizza
records.action: suspend royalty payments & limit investment – restaurants remain open

records.name: Ecco
records.action: suspend new investments still operating in Russia

records.name: Eesti Gaas
records.action: continues to import Russian gas but is looking for alternatives

records.name: Ehrmann
records.action: continue sales in Russia but suspend new investments

records.name: Eli Lilly
records.action: suspend new investments and clinical trials

records.name: ESL
records.action: ban people with ties to Russian government

records.name: FM Global
records.action: stopped renewing and underwriting new reinsurance

records.name: Focus Brands - Cinnabon
records.action: no new investments and expansion plans on hold

records.name: Freelancer
records.action: still operating in Russia; sanctioned payment methods disabled

records.name: Freudenberg Group
records.action: cease trading operations with Russia & Belarus; running plants in Russia

records.name: GlaxoSmithKline
records.action: stopped advertising/new clinical trials in Russia

records.name: Glencore
records.action: stop entering into new Russian commodities trading contracts but continue holding substantive Russian equity stakes

records.name: GROUPE LIMAGRAIN/JACQUET-BROSSARD
records.action: continues flows to Russian and Ukrainian producers but suspends its project to build a seed factory in Russia

records.name: Groupe Seb
records.action: suspend new investments and "sharply" reduce activities in Russia

records.name: Hellenic Bank
records.action: maintain rep offices in Russia; observe all banking sactions

records.name: Hellenic Petroleum
records.action: seeks new oil supplier to replace Russian oil

records.name: HiPP

records.name: Japan Tobacco

records.action: pause patient enrollment in ongoing trials

records.name: Roche

records.name: Sanofi

records.name: SC Johnson

records.name: Schlumberger

records.name: Signify

records.name: Soudal

records.name: SRV

records.action: continuing existing projects; no new business

records.name: TMF Group

records.name: TOM Tailor
records.action: no official statement; online sales suspended but advertising continues

records.name: Toyota Tsusho

records.name: Unilever

records.name: UnionPay

records.name: Vestas

records.name: Vimeo
records.action: not accept new customers from Russia

records.name: Welltec
records.action: suspend all new investments in Russia

records.name: Wintershall Dea AG
records.action: maintain Russian natural gas projects and critical infrastructure; write-off Nord Stream2 loans

records.name: Xiaomi
records.action: reported to suspend operations in Russia

records.name: Yokohama
records.action: decision to renew production in Russia despite previous announcements to halt production

scalingback.description:
Reducing Current Operations (171 Companies) (Grade: C)
Companies that are scaling back some significant business operations but continuing some others...

records.name: ABB
records.action: temporarily pausing all new orders and operational activity

records.name: Activision Blizzard
records.action: suspend new sales of and in our games in Russia

records.name: Adobe

records.name: AGCO
records.action: stop sale of new machines to Russia

records.name: AkzoNobel

records.name: Alphabet

records.name: Amgen

records.name: AmRest

records.name: Avaya
